mutants.code:
def invert_phrase(phrase):
    words = phrase.split('')
    inverted_words = [word[::-1] for word in words]
    inverted_phrase = ' '.join(inverted_words)
    return inverted_phrase

def invert_phrase(phrase):
    words = phrase.split(' ')
    inverted_words = [word[::-1] for word in words]
    inverted_phrase = ''.join(inverted_words)
    return inverted_phrase

def invert_phrase(phrase):
    words = phrase.split(' ')
    inverted_words = [word[::+1] for word in words]
    inverted_phrase = ' '.join(inverted_words)
    return inverted_phrase

def invert_phrase(phrase):
    words = phrase.split(' ')
    inverted_words = [word[::-2] for word in words]
    inverted_phrase = ' '.join(inverted_words)
    return inverted_phrase

def invert_phrase(phrase):
    words = phrase.split(' ')
    inverted_words = [word[::-0] for word in words]
    inverted_phrase = ' '.join(inverted_words)
    return inverted_phrase

def invert_phrase(phrase):
    words = phrase.split(' ')
    inverted_words = [word[::-0] for word in words]
    inverted_phrase = ' '.join(inverted_words)
    return inverted_phrase

def invert_phrase(phrase):
    words = phrase.split(' ')
    inverted_words = [word[::--1] for word in words]
    inverted_phrase = ' '.join(inverted_words)
    return inverted_phrase
